pages.title: ‎Getting Started with Fitness+
pages.description: Get started with Apple Fitness+. Update to the latest iOS and watchOS to get started with Apple Fitness+ or redeem your 3 months free offer.

Update to the latest iOS to get started with Apple Fitness+ and redeem up to 3 months free*.
Learn more about Apple Fitness+

# What you’ll need to get started on iPhone:
 - iPhone 8 or later updated to iOS 16.1

      To update your iPhone, go to Settings > General > Software Update.

      
        


  Identify your iPhone


      

      
        


  Shop iPhone
 - iPhone 8 or later updated to iOS 16.1
 - To update your iPhone, go to Settings > General > Software Update.
 - Identify your iPhone
 - Shop iPhone
 - iPhone 8 or later updated to iOS 16.1
 - To update your iPhone, go to Settings > General > Software Update.
 - Identify your iPhone
 - Shop iPhone
 - iPad, iPad Air, iPad Pro, or iPad mini updated to iPadOS 16.1 and the Fitness app installed.
 - Apple TV HD or Apple TV 4K updated to tvOS 16.1

# What you’ll need for personal metrics with Apple Watch:
 - iPhone 6s or later updated to iOS 14.3
      To update your iPhone, go to Settings > General > Software Update.

      
        


  Identify your iPhone


      

      
        


  Shop iPhone
 - iPhone 6s or later updated to iOS 14.3
 - To update your iPhone, go to Settings > General > Software Update.
 - Identify your iPhone
 - Shop iPhone
 - Apple Watch Series 3 or later updated to watchOS 7.2
      
        To update your Apple Watch, open the Watch app on your iPhone, then go to General > Software Update.
      

      
        


  Identify your Apple Watch


      

      
        


  Shop Apple Watch
 - Apple Watch Series 3 or later updated to watchOS 7.2
 - To update your Apple Watch, open the Watch app on your iPhone, then go to General > Software Update.
 - Identify your Apple Watch
 - Shop Apple Watch
 - iPhone 6s or later updated to iOS 14.3
 - To update your iPhone, go to Settings > General > Software Update.
 - Identify your iPhone
 - Shop iPhone
 - Apple Watch Series 3 or later updated to watchOS 7.2
 - To update your Apple Watch, open the Watch app on your iPhone, then go to General > Software Update.
 - Identify your Apple Watch
 - Shop Apple Watch
 - iPad Air 2 or later updated to iPadOS 14.3 and the Fitness app installed.
 - Apple TV HD or Apple TV 4K updated to tvOS 14.3 and the Fitness app installed.

# All set?
To sign up for Apple Fitness+, go to the Fitness app on your iPhone and tap the Fitness+ tab.

# Looking for the Fitness app for iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV?
 - The Fitness app automatically appears on your iPhone after you first pair an Apple Watch, or when your iPhone is updated to iOS 16.
 - The Fitness+ tab automatically appears in the Fitness app on your iPhone after you first pair an Apple Watch, or when your iPhone is updated to iOS 16.1.
 - The Fitness app automatically appears on your Apple TV when updated to tvOS 14.3.
 - To use Apple Fitness+ on iPad, download the Fitness app from the App Store.
Fitness App in the App Store

# Have more questions?
Apple Support is here to help
 - A subscription is required for Apple Fitness+.
 - *Get 3 months of Apple Fitness+ free when you buy a new Apple Watch Series 4 or later, iPhone 11 or later, iPad (9th generation) or later, iPad Air (5th generation) or later, iPad mini (6th generation) or later, iPad Pro 11-inch (3rd generation) or later, iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation) or later, Apple TV HD, or Apple TV 4K (2nd generation); subject to the terms and conditions
